snippet: The White House argued that the “unique circumstances” presented by the opportunity to return Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl gave President Obama the authority to lawfully bypass a federal statute.
abstract: Obama administration argues that 'unique circumstances' presented by opportunity to return prisoner of war Sgt Bowe Bergdahl gave Pres Obama authority to lawfully bypass federal statute requiring Pentagon to notify Congress month before the transfer of Taliban detainees; White House is forced by turns to defend its decision not to notify Congress and to send important aides to apologize to angry lawmakers.

byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and DAVID E. SANGER
